hero.title: Hi, I'm Rrish.
hero.subtitle: I'm a musician who improvises on blues and different music genres. I help people learn music at every level and improve their improvisation skills.

about.title: About Me
content: I'm a passionate musician specializing in blues improvisation and teaching. With years of experience performing and teaching, I help students develop their unique musical voice.

My approach focuses on understanding music theory while maintaining the creative freedom that makes improvisation so exciting. Whether you're a complete beginner or looking to refine your skills, I'll meet you where you are.

approach.title: My Teaching Approach
approach.subtitle: Learn music the way that works for you

principles.title: Individual Focus
principles.description: Every student learns differently. I tailor lessons to your learning style, goals, and musical interests.

principles.title: Theory + Practice
principles.description: Balance understanding the 'why' behind music with hands-on playing and improvisation.

principles.title: Creative Freedom
principles.description: Music is about expression. I help you develop technical skills while maintaining your creative voice.
